verses.verse: Then all <S%H3605><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> went out, <S%H3318><s%> and the congregation <S%H5712><s%> was gathered together <S%H6950><s%> as one <S%H259><s%> man, <S%H376><s%> from Dan <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1835><s%> even to <S%H5704><s%> Beer-sheba, <S%H884><s%> with the land <S%H776><s%> of Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> in Mizpeh. <S%H4709><s%>

And the chief <S%H6438><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> even of all <S%H3605><s%> the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> presented themselves <S%H3320><s%> in the assembly <S%H6951><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> footmen <S%H376><s%> <S%H7273><s%> that drew <S%H8025><s%> sword. <S%H2719><s%>

(Now the children <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> were gone up <S%H5927><s%> to Mizpeh.) <S%H4709><s%> Then said <S%H559><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> Tell <S%H1696><s%> us, how <S%H349><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> wickedness? <S%H7451><s%>

And the Levite, <S%H376><s%> <S%H3881><s%> the husband <S%H376><s%> of the woman <S%H802><s%> that was slain, <S%H7523><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> I came <S%H935><s%> into Gibeah <S%H1390><s%> that <S%H834><s%> belongeth to Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> I <S%H589><s%> and my concubine, <S%H6370><s%> to lodge. <S%H3885><s%>

And the men <S%H1167><s%> of Gibeah <S%H1390><s%> rose <S%H6965><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> me, and beset the house round about <S%H5437><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1004><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> me by night, <S%H3915><s%> and thought <S%H1819><s%> to have slain <S%H2026><s%> me: and my concubine <S%H6370><s%> have they forced, <S%H6031><s%> that she is dead. <S%H4191><s%>

And I took <S%H270><s%> my concubine, <S%H6370><s%> and cut her in pieces, <S%H5408><s%> and sent <S%H7971><s%> her throughout all <S%H3605><s%> the country <S%H7704><s%> of the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> they have committed <S%H6213><s%> lewdness <S%H2154><s%> and folly <S%H5039><s%> in Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
Behold, <S%H2009><s%> ye are all <S%H3605><s%> children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> give <S%H3051><s%> here <S%H1988><s%> your advice <S%H1697><s%> and counsel. <S%H6098><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> arose <S%H6965><s%> as one <S%H259><s%> man, <S%H376><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> We will not <S%H3808><s%> any <S%H376><s%> of us go <S%H1980><s%> to his tent, <S%H168><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> will we any <S%H376><s%> of us turn <S%H5493><s%> into his house. <S%H1004><s%>

But now <S%H6258><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> shall be the thing <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> we will do <S%H6213><s%> to Gibeah; <S%H1390><s%> we will go up by lot <S%H1486><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> it;

And we will take <S%H3947><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> men <S%H376><s%> of a hundred <S%H3967><s%> throughout all <S%H3605><s%> the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and a hundred <S%H3967><s%> of a thousand, <S%H505><s%> and a thousand <S%H505><s%> out of ten thousand, <S%H7233><s%> to fetch <S%H3947><s%> victual <S%H6720><s%> for the people, <S%H5971><s%> that they may do, <S%H6213><s%> when they come <S%H935><s%> to Gibeah <S%H1387><s%> of Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> the folly <S%H5039><s%> that <S%H834><s%> they have wrought <S%H6213><s%> in Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

So all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> were gathered <S%H622><s%> against <S%H413><s%> the city, <S%H5892><s%> knit together <S%H2270><s%> as one <S%H259><s%> man. <S%H376><s%>

And the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> men <S%H376><s%> through all <S%H3605><s%> the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> wickedness <S%H7451><s%> is this <S%H2063><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is done <S%H1961><s%> among you?

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore deliver <S%H5414><s%> us <S%H853><s%> the men, <S%H376><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Belial, <S%H1100><s%> which <S%H834><s%> are in Gibeah, <S%H1390><s%> that we may put them to death, <S%H4191><s%> and put away <S%H1197><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> from Israel. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3478><s%> But the children <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> would <S%H14><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> hearken <S%H8085><s%> to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of their brethren <S%H251><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%>

But the children <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> gathered themselves together <S%H622><s%> out of <S%H4480><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> unto Gibeah, <S%H1390><s%> to go out <S%H3318><s%> to battle <S%H4421><s%> against <S%H5973><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> were numbered <S%H6485><s%> at that <S%H1931><s%> time <S%H3117><s%> out of the cities <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5892><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> and six <S%H8337><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> men <S%H376><s%> that drew <S%H8025><s%> sword, <S%H2719><s%> beside <S%H905><s%> the inhabitants <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3427><s%> of Gibeah, <S%H1390><s%> which were numbered <S%H6485><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> chosen <S%H970><s%> men. <S%H376><s%>

Among all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> there were seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> chosen <S%H977><s%> men <S%H376><s%> left-handed; <S%H334><s%> <S%H3027><s%> <S%H3225><s%> every one <S%H3605><s%> <S%H2088><s%> could sling <S%H7049><s%> stones <S%H68><s%> at <S%H413><s%> a hair <S%H8185><s%> breadth, and not <S%H3808><s%> miss. <S%H2398><s%>

And the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> beside <S%H905><s%> Benjamin, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1144><s%> were numbered <S%H6485><s%> four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> men <S%H376><s%> that drew <S%H8025><s%> sword: <S%H2719><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H2088><s%> were men <S%H376><s%> of war. <S%H4421><s%>

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> arose, <S%H6965><s%> and went up <S%H5927><s%> to the house of God, <S%H1008><s%> and asked counsel <S%H7592><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Which <S%H4310><s%> of us shall go up <S%H5927><s%> first <S%H8462><s%> to the battle <S%H4421><s%> against <S%H5973><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin? <S%H1144><s%> And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Judah <S%H3063><s%> shall go up first. <S%H8462><s%>
And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> rose up <S%H6965><s%> in the morning, <S%H1242><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> Gibeah. <S%H1390><s%>

And the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> to battle <S%H4421><s%> against <S%H5973><s%> Benjamin; <S%H1144><s%> and the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> put themselves in array <S%H6186><s%> to fight <S%H4421><s%> against <S%H854><s%> them at <S%H413><s%> Gibeah. <S%H1390><s%>

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> came forth <S%H3318><s%> out of <S%H4480><s%> Gibeah, <S%H1390><s%> and destroyed down <S%H7843><s%> to the ground <S%H776><s%> of the Israelites <S%H3478><s%> that <S%H1931><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> men. <S%H376><s%>

And the people <S%H5971><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> encouraged themselves, <S%H2388><s%> and set <S%H6186><s%> their battle <S%H4421><s%> again <S%H3254><s%> in array <S%H6186><s%> in the place <S%H4725><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> they put themselves in array <S%H6186><s%> the first <S%H7223><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

(And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> and wept <S%H1058><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> even, <S%H6153><s%> and asked counsel <S%H7592><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Shall I go up <S%H5066><s%> again <S%H3254><s%> to battle <S%H4421><s%> against <S%H5973><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> my brother? <S%H251><s%> And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Go up <S%H5927><s%> against <S%H413><s%> him.)
And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> came near <S%H7126><s%> against <S%H413><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> the second <S%H8145><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

And Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> went forth <S%H3318><s%> against <S%H7125><s%> them out of <S%H4480><s%> Gibeah <S%H1390><s%> the second <S%H8145><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> and destroyed <S%H7843><s%> down to the ground <S%H776><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> again <S%H5750><s%> eighteen <S%H8083><s%> <S%H6240><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> men; <S%H376><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> drew <S%H8025><s%> the sword. <S%H2719><s%>

Then all <S%H3605><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> went up, <S%H5927><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> unto the house of God, <S%H1008><s%> and wept, <S%H1058><s%> and sat <S%H3427><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and fasted <S%H6684><s%> that <S%H1931><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> even, <S%H6153><s%> and offered <S%H5927><s%> burnt offerings <S%H5930><s%> and peace offerings <S%H8002><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> inquired <S%H7592><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> (for the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> was there <S%H8033><s%> in those <S%H1992><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%>

And Phinehas, <S%H6372><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Eleazar, <S%H499><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron, <S%H175><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> it in those <S%H1992><s%> days,) <S%H3117><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Shall I yet <S%H5750><s%> again <S%H3254><s%> go out <S%H3318><s%> to battle <S%H4421><s%> against <S%H5973><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> my brother, <S%H251><s%> or <S%H518><s%> shall I cease? <S%H2308><s%> And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Go up; <S%H5927><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> tomorrow <S%H4279><s%> I will deliver <S%H5414><s%> them into thine hand. <S%H3027><s%>
And Israel <S%H3478><s%> set <S%H7760><s%> liers in wait <S%H693><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> <S%H413><s%> Gibeah. <S%H1390><s%>

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> against <S%H413><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> on the third <S%H7992><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> and put themselves in array <S%H6186><s%> against <S%H413><s%> Gibeah, <S%H1390><s%> as at other times. <S%H6471><s%> <S%H6471><s%>

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> against <S%H7125><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> and were drawn away <S%H5423><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> the city; <S%H5892><s%> and they began <S%H2490><s%> to smite <S%H5221><s%> of the people, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5971><s%> and kill, <S%H2491><s%> as at other times, <S%H6471><s%> <S%H6471><s%> in the highways, <S%H4546><s%> of which <S%H834><s%> one <S%H259><s%> goeth up <S%H5927><s%> to the house of God, <S%H1008><s%> and the other <S%H259><s%> to Gibeah <S%H1390><s%> in the field, <S%H7704><s%> about thirty <S%H7970><s%> men <S%H376><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> They <S%H1992><s%> are smitten down <S%H5062><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> us, as at the first. <S%H7223><s%> But the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Let us flee, <S%H5127><s%> and draw <S%H5423><s%> them from <S%H4480><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the highways. <S%H4546><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> rose up <S%H6965><s%> out of their place, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4725><s%> and put themselves in array <S%H6186><s%> at Baal-tamar: <S%H1193><s%> and the liers in wait <S%H693><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> came forth <S%H1518><s%> out of their places, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4725><s%> even out of the meadows <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4629><s%> of Gibeah. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1390><s%>

And there came <S%H935><s%> against <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5048><s%> Gibeah <S%H1390><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> chosen <S%H977><s%> men <S%H376><s%> out of all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and the battle <S%H4421><s%> was sore: <S%H3513><s%> but they <S%H1992><s%> knew <S%H3045><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> was near <S%H5060><s%> them.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> smote <S%H5062><s%> <S%H853><s%> Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Israel: <S%H3478><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> destroyed <S%H7843><s%> of the Benjamites <S%H1144><s%> that <S%H1931><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and a hundred <S%H3967><s%> men: <S%H376><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> drew <S%H8025><s%> the sword. <S%H2719><s%>

So the children <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> they were smitten: <S%H5062><s%> for the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> place <S%H4725><s%> to the Benjamites, <S%H1144><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> they trusted <S%H982><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the liers in wait <S%H693><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they had set <S%H7760><s%> beside <S%H413><s%> Gibeah. <S%H1390><s%>

And the liers in wait <S%H693><s%> hasted, <S%H2363><s%> and rushed <S%H6584><s%> upon <S%H413><s%> Gibeah; <S%H1390><s%> and the liers in wait <S%H693><s%> drew themselves along, <S%H4900><s%> and smote <S%H5221><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword. <S%H2719><s%>

Now there was <S%H1961><s%> an appointed sign <S%H4150><s%> between the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> and the liers in wait, <S%H693><s%> that they should make a great <S%H7235><s%> flame <S%H4864><s%> with smoke <S%H6227><s%> rise up <S%H5927><s%> out of <S%H4480><s%> the city. <S%H5892><s%>

And when the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> retired <S%H2015><s%> in the battle, <S%H4421><s%> Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> began <S%H2490><s%> to smite <S%H5221><s%> and kill <S%H2491><s%> of the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> about thirty <S%H7970><s%> persons: <S%H376><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> they said, <S%H559><s%> Surely <S%H389><s%> they <S%H1931><s%> are smitten down <S%H5062><s%> <S%H5062><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> us, as in the first <S%H7223><s%> battle. <S%H4421><s%>

But when the flame <S%H4864><s%> began <S%H2490><s%> to arise up <S%H5927><s%> out of <S%H4480><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> with a pillar <S%H5982><s%> of smoke, <S%H6227><s%> the Benjamites <S%H1144><s%> looked <S%H6437><s%> behind <S%H310><s%> them, and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> the flame <S%H3632><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> ascended up <S%H5927><s%> to heaven. <S%H8064><s%>

And when the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> turned again, <S%H2015><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> were amazed: <S%H926><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> they saw <S%H7200><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> was come <S%H5060><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> them.

Therefore they turned <S%H6437><s%> their backs before <S%H6440><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> of the wilderness; <S%H4057><s%> but the battle <S%H4421><s%> overtook <S%H1692><s%> them; and them which <S%H834><s%> came out of the cities <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5892><s%> they destroyed <S%H7843><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of them.
